${modID}:HalfEatenGourmetBagel.NAME: Half Eaten Gourmet Bagel
${modID}:HalfEatenGourmetBagel.FLAVOR: It was a gift from Amy's coworkers.

${modID}:BoxOfHalfEatenGourmetBagels.NAME: Box Of Half Eaten Gourmet Bagels
${modID}:BoxOfHalfEatenGourmetBagels.FLAVOR: OH MY GOD HE'S GOTTEN INTO THE WHOLE BOX
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #ymusclemantot:Binge. Gain #b1 #ymusclemantot:Binge after you #y:ymusclemantot:Purge.

${modID}:CatnipBanana.NAME: Catnip Banana
${modID}:CatnipBanana.FLAVOR: A menace that needs to be hunted. Yellow fruit can't be trusted.

${modID}:AutomaticFeeder.NAME: Automatic Feeder
${modID}:AutomaticFeeder.FLAVOR: Giver of life, sustenance, and joy.

${modID}:CatHammock.NAME: Cat Hammock
${modID}:CatHammock.FLAVOR: The perfect place to rest after a meal.
DESCRIPTIONS: If your #ymusclemantot:Binge is over #b0 at the end of combat, heal an amount equal to your #ymusclemantot:Binge.

${modID}:Prozac.NAME: Prozac
${modID}:Prozac.FLAVOR: We've liked him a lot more ever since he started taking it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ymusclemantot:Purge, its effects are increased by #b1.
